amendment.description: To increase by $200,000,000 the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IX for the purpose of supplying needed humanitarian assistance to the innocent Lebanese and Israeli civilians who have been affected by the hostilities between Hezbollah and the Government of Israel.

action.text: Amendment SA 4875 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4875.

Amendment SA 4875 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S8714-8716; text: CR S8714) To increase by $200,000,000 the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IX for the purpose of supplying needed humanitarian assistance to the innocent Lebanese and Israeli civilians who have been affected by the hostilities between Hezbollah and the Government of Israel.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4875 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
